item.title: Faster data transfer by VE DMA
item.description: On VE, you can use usual read(2) and write(2) to accesse file system or to transfer data through socket. But its speed is about 1GB/s at maximum in our experience. When we want to accelerate data transfer between VE and CPU, we use VE DMA. Since VE DMA has its own API for DMA, we have to rewrite a program. But we can reach 10GB/s. Here is the result of our experiment.
